data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong, Guizhou, China not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Qiandongnan Miao and Dong, Guizhou, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the county of Qiandongnan Miao and Dong a passion to plant another simple church.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Qiandongnan Miao and Dong, Guizhou, China need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong, Guizhou, China.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Diao people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Diao people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Diao people is yours.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Qiandongnan Miao and Dong, Guizhou, China.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong, Guizhou, China, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.focus_label: Qiandongnan Miao and Dong, Guizhou, China
data.section_summary:
the county of Qiandongnan Miao and Dong, Guizhou, China has a population of 223,100.

We estimate Qiandongnan Miao and Dong has 16,925 people who might know Jesus, 3,604 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 202,571 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 16,925 believers in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
